name: Dirt Bike Xtrem Stunt - Racing
description:
Are you a fan of dirt bike and the extreme stunts? then try this game.
Complete all of the immoderately onerous courses!
Dirt Bike Xtrem Stunt Racing features :
-Hundreds of crazy tracks and mad worlds
-Cool stunts
- Don't miss the free updates with lots of new content

This is a new edition of a game you get enthusiastic about, that you just can challenge it varied times since its thus mortifying.

The number of levels could be a shocking one hundred.

It depends on your techniques if you'll beat the course or not!

Working the accelerator and the way you tilt bikes, riding a bike could be a profound factor.
